title: Opinion: STAT+: If you have Alzheimer’s disease, who will take part in your care?
description: Doctors working with patients with Alzheimer’s and other causes of dementia must ask: Who will take part in your care?
content: Doctors working with patients with Alzheimer’s and other causes of dementia must ask: Who will take part in your care?
